roleset.name: Movement, interstellar?
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in ON-miss. Framed by Claire. No VerbNet entry; can't find this verb in any dictionaries.

example.name: only example...ever?
example.text: Now , it will auguster into the surface of the Red Planet and put those samples into various scientific instruments .
example.arg: into the surface of the Red Planet
